item.title: Wifi Indoor Positioning
item.description: OVERVIEW Many real-world applications need to know the localization of a user in the world to provide their services. Therefore, automatic user localization has been a hot research topic in the last years. Automatic user localization consists of estimating the position of the user (latitude, longitude, and altitude) by using an electronic device, usually a mobile phone. Outdoor localization problem can be solved very accurately thanks to the inclusion of GPS sensors into the mobile devices.

item.title: Stack overflow 2018 survey analysis
item.description: Report purpose The goal of this report is to analyise the stack overflow survey made in 2018, here is the link to the data. We will put the focus on developers working as data analysts and data scientists. The main questions to answer would be: How much do they earn? We will only analyse the ones living in European countries like Germany, Spain or France. Which are the technologies they use?
